Trump's support tumbled into the 30s in a matchup against presumptive Democratic nominee Joe Biden, a new survey of registered voters found.

Since early in his presidential campaign, Trump has shown a complete lack of respect for McCain, a man who fought and nearly died for his country.

Trump offered a total lie when he claimed that the US could fight the coronavirus if it resurged in the fall without shutting down states and economies.

Attorney General William Barr is threatening governors who keep stay at home orders in place with legal action if they don't open their economies.

Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi explains how Democrats stood together and broke through McConnell and Trump's obstruction to deliver a victory for small businesses.

A new VA study found that more coronavirus patients died when given hydroxychloroquine then compared to being standard medical care.

Texas Lt. Gov. Dan Patrick is spreading more of Trump's death cult mentality as he proclaimed that the economy is more important than living.

The Republican-led Senate Intelligence Committee released a report confirming the findings of the intelligence community that Russia helped Trump win in 2016.

Both White House and Trump advisers say that Trump's incompetent response on coronavirus testing is the final nail in an almost closed political coffin.

Democrats have united to condemn the President’s ban on immigration. Donald Trump announced an apparent halt to all immigration into the U.S. on Twitter.

Trump said he would sign an executive order ending immigration due to Coronavirus. There is no indication when this order might come into effect, but Congressional Democrats were quick to condemn it. read more
